data_table.description: Insulin, Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2. The measurement of fasting serum insulin concentrations was performed in part accomplish aims of red blood cell (RBC) fatty acid analysis and to define the cross-sectional clinical correlates and heritability of RBC n-3 FA content.

variable.name: INSULIN
variable.comment: To convert insulin pmol/L to uU/mL divide insulin pmol/L by 6.945 e.g. 50 pmol/L /6.945 = 7.199 uU/mL Values falling below the measureable range were set to 1.39. There were no values above the measurable range. See measurable range indicator INSULIN_I.

variable.name: INSULIN_I
variable.comment: To convert insulin pmol/L to uU/mL divide insulin pmol/L by 6.945 e.g. 50 pmol/L /6.945 = 7.199 uU/mL Values falling below the measureable range were set to 1.39. There were no values above the measurable range. See measurable range indicator INSULIN_I.
